/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene scene of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the surroundings. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. A tranquil lake graces the right side of the street, its calm waters reflecting the blue of the sky. The sky itself is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, adding to the overall tranquility of the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky and lake.
